channel.title: Antipope John Paul II on Extra Ecclesiam Nulla Salus
channel.description: Recent content in Antipope John Paul II on Extra Ecclesiam Nulla Salus

item.title: The Heresies of John Paul II, the most traveled man in history and perhaps the most heretical
item.description: By Brother Michael Dimond and Brother Peter Dimond, O.S.B. Source: vaticancatholic.com “KING: The pope congratulated your children's bar mitzvahs? ”LEVINE: Not only congratulate us, he sent us a menorah. ”KING: He sent you a menorah? ”LEVINE: He gave it to us, actually, didn't send it. Actually gave us a menorah. I think it's from the 16th century in Prague. It's the most beautiful menorah. He sent a letter on the occasion of each of my son's bar mitzvahs.
